game_description: Diet Smash has a 'Hit' mode in which you have to avoid bombs by hitting a shuttlecock flying in the background of the indoor badminton court of the 'My Town' worldview. And you can enjoy the 'Bounce' mode where you have to bounce the shuttlecock with a racket for a long time without dropping it on the ground in a confined space.
review_1: First, thank you developers for this fun badminton workout, I enjoyed it. More please , the environment is nice , good workout . Please continue to add more workout , more gameplay with AI. I do recommend this fun badminton workout to everyone to enjoy.
review_2: where is the left hander setting
